Description: A combination of the year and state name
Year in which the data is collected
State in which the data is collected
The U.S. Census Bureau's count for students in the state
The total amount of revenue for the state
The total amount of federal revenue for the state
The total amount of state revenue for the state
The total amount of local revenue for the state
The total expenditure for the state
The instruction expenditure for the state
The support services expenditure for the state
The expenditure used for other smaller expensesfor the state
The capital outlay expenditure for the state
Total number of students in the state
Total number of students in the indicated grade (G = G01-G12 (grades 1 to 12), PK (Pre-kindergarten),  KG (kindergarten))

Total number of students in the indicated grade with the indicated ethnicity and sex (G = Grade; E = AM (American Indian or Alaska Native), AS (Asian), HI (Hispanic/Latino), BL (Black or African American), WH (White), HP (Hawaiian Native/Pacific Islander), and TR (Two or More Races); S = M (Male) and F (Female))
Average score of students on the Reading test in the indicated grade with the indicated ethnicity and sex (G = Grade; E = Ethnicity (A = all); S = Sex (A = all))
Average score of students on the Mathematics test in the indicated grade with the indicated ethnicity and sex (G = Grade; E = Ethnicity (A = all); S = Sex (A = all))
